Package org.openhab.core.extension

Class Extension

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.core.extension.Extension
  • public class Extension
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines an extension.
    Author:
    Kai Kreuzer - Initial contribution

    • Constructor Detail

      • Extension

        public Extension​(java.lang.String id,
                 java.lang.String type,
                 java.lang.String label,
                 java.lang.String version,
                 java.lang.String link,
                 boolean installed)
        Creates a new Extension instance
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the extension
        type - the type id of the extension
        label - the label of the extension
        version - the version of the extension
        link - the link to find more information about the extension (can be null)
        installed - true, if the extension is installed, false otherwise

      • Extension

        public Extension​(java.lang.String id,
                 java.lang.String type,
                 java.lang.String label,
                 java.lang.String version,
                 java.lang.String link,
                 boolean installed,
                 java.lang.String description,
                 java.lang.String backgroundColor,
                 java.lang.String imageLink)
        Creates a new Extension instance
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the extension
        type - the type id of the extension
        label - the label of the extension
        version - the version of the extension
        description - the detailed description of the extension (may be null)
        backgroundColor - for displaying the extension (may be null)
        link - the link to find more information about the extension (may be null)
        imageLink - the link to an image (png/svg) (may be null)
        installed - true, if the extension is installed, false otherwise
